markdownRemark.html: Medina Azahara (Madinat al-Zahra) was the most beautiful example of the al-andalus splendor. Madīnat al-Zahrā', was an Umayyad residence between the tenth and eleventh centuries B.C. The archaeological site is located at the foot of the Sierra Morena, about 5 km west of Cordoba.

frontmatter.title: Medina al-Zahra
frontmatter.description: Medina al-Zahra - Medina Azahara (Madinat al-Zahra) was the most beautiful example of the al-andalus splendor. Madīnat al-Zahrā', was an Umayyad residence between the tenth and eleventh centuries B.C. The archaeological site is located at the foot of the Sierra Morena, about 5 km west of Cordoba.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. Palma del Río, km 5.5, 14005 Córdoba
